```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, comment = "", tidy = FALSE)

require(tidyverse)
require(modelr)
require(magrittr)
require(gam)
require(sf)
```


```{r}
world = spData::world
```


```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}

africa =  world %>% 
  filter(continent == "Africa")

case.countries = africa %>% 
  filter(name_long %in% c("Nigeria", "Uganda", "Tanzania", "Liberia", "Ghana", "Democratic Republic of the Congo"))


ggplot()+
  ggspatial::layer_spatial(data = africa, 
                           col = "#ED6300", fill = "#FBE1CB",size = .5) +
  ggspatial::layer_spatial(data = case.countries,
                           col = "#ED6300", fill = "cyan4",size = .5, alpha = .2)+
  # geom_sf_text(data = case.countries, aes(label = name_long))+
  coord_sf(crs = 4326)+
  cowplot::theme_map()


```
